subtitles:
177320 179880 - Oh, God.
- Keep your shit together.
179960 182918 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

183720 186280 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it.

210440 213159 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

213240 216915 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

217000 222028 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

222120 225430 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

233680 236717 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

238760 242878 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
242960 244473 We'll get you out of here.

244560 249031 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
265680 267716 Get it off! Get it off!

271200 274272 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her.

282600 285672 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now.

962440 965193 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up.

973000 975468 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1001680 1005116 - Let's go. Let's go.
- What the fuck is going on?

1033880 1038431 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1040520 1045514 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"You can't leave that lying there."
1045600 1049479 He says "It's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1059640 1062438 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1068960 1072316 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1076720 1082875 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1082960 1088478 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm hallucinating.

1111080 1117076 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1117160 1121153 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1122000 1124639 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1124720 1129236 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1132960 1135679 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1138200 1140589 There was something in the blood.

1142000 1146755 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1153600 1156194 And that's when the exodus started.

1160240 1163755 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1166040 1168838 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1171680 1174513 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1177040 1180953 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane.

1181040 1185158 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1186560 1189518 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1190120 1194113 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1211760 1215594 I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it.
1215680 1218148 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1232320 1236552 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1238960 1242873 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1246880 1250316 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together.

1264400 1267437 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1293240 1296915 - If there's anyone in there who...
- I understand.

1425080 1428868 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1435080 1439392 My parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1441920 1447040 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1447640 1449915 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1450000 1453197 even though cash was completely useless.
1454680 1457672 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1463000 1465230 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1467320 1469550 I remember the ground was soft.

1471440 1475638 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1475720 1479508 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1479600 1483388 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1483480 1486677 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1488240 1491198 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1491280 1493555 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1495760 1500515 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1500600 1504309 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1517840 1522789 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1525360 1528079 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1528160 1531357 We'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1629840 1632035 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1640560 1642551 I'll start working on them, then.

1674640 1677473 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1677560 1679676 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1682800 1685633 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1721920 1723911 Do you have any clothes here?

1726880 1730395 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1730480 1733995 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1761600 1764478 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1764560 1768314 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1768400 1773554 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1773640 1777872 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1777960 1782875 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1782960 1788159 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1788240 1792279 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans?

1792360 1796638 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world orjust fall in love and fuck?
1799200 1801668 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1858000 1860992 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1861080 1864038 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1881240 1883231 Now I do need a break.

1902200 1907274 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1908440 1912513 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1914720 1916870 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1916960 1921829 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

1927320 1931074 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2004440 2007318 - Open the fucking door.
- Where's Dad?
2007400 2009595 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2043480 2046870 Good to meet you.
This is my daughter Hannah.
2059240 2061435 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2061520 2064432 Why don't you all sit down and...
2064520 2067353 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2067440 2069829 We've got Mum's crème de menthe.

2080360 2083238 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2083320 2086073 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2107920 2110878 I know it isn't much, but cheers.

2138520 2143878 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2145480 2147630 You'll have to use the bucket.
2153920 2156434 Have to empty it each morning.

2156520 2160035 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2161840 2164832 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2177640 2179915 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2215120 2218669 - So what do you make of them?
- They're desperate.
2219760 2222479 Probably need us more than we need them.

2233320 2237791 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2237880 2241475 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2245760 2249150 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2264560 2267677 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2269480 2273314 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2304200 2306191 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2306280 2310239 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2310320 2313392 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2329200 2333273 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2333360 2336955 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2352360 2355352 We're not going to be able to stay here.

2363920 2367515 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2367600 2371991 Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2372080 2374958 If you can hear this, you're not alone.

2375040 2379352 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2379440 2381556 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2384880 2389271 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2392720 2396474 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now itjust repeats.
2398920 2401718 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2405320 2409916 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2415560 2421396 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2421480 2424517 - I didn't...
- It's OK. It's the truth.
2424600 2426989 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2427080 2430868 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2432680 2436798 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2436880 2440236 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection.

2440320 2444438 There is no answer.
It's already done all the damage it can.

2444520 2447239 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2447320 2451233 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying.

2455520 2460992 Anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2464320 2469394 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2470080 2472071 We have to try and get there.

2485640 2489235 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2516640 2519518 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2519600 2524628 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2541520 2543909 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2544760 2547991 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2548080 2552278 We're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars.
2552360 2555158 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea.
2589360 2591669 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2591760 2594957 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2597360 2599430 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.
2613440 2616830 Do you hear that? Hey, do you hear that?

2647520 2651638 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2651720 2654837 Grab hold. One, two, three, lift!

2661040 2665955 - Don't look at them.
- I can see them. They're coming.

2676400 2679198 - Get the tyre on.
- I'm trying.

2692040 2694395 - Get in the car.
- Come on.
2767760 2771196 Don't take anything that needs to be cooked.
2771280 2773032 I think you can eat that raw.

2780400 2784712 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.
2800480 2803597 "Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth."
2856240 2859198 Either we do this now or we're walking.
2909280 2911840 Like going on holidays with your aunt.

3005960 3008633 - Find anything?
- No. Let's get outta here.
3081480 3084358 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.

3146640 3150189 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3150280 3154273 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3155280 3158955 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3169480 3171675 I was thinking I was wrong.

3182640 3186952 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...
3188280 3191590 she's got her dad and he's got his daughter.

3194160 3197630 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.

3220560 3224394 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3251560 3254120 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3270240 3273949 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3274040 3278158 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3280760 3283228 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3283320 3286869 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3286960 3289110 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3301080 3303674 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3304720 3308554 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3382320 3384993 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3438040 3441396 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3441480 3446270 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door.
3469840 3474152 Our location is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3481320 3484232 The answer to Infection is here.
3519080 3522311 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3524080 3526310 No fire crews to put it out.
3651920 3655754 I don't understand, Dad. Did they leave?

3655840 3658832 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No.

3665400 3670030 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3781680 3784478 - Dad?
- Keep away from me. Keep away from me.
3784560 3786949 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
3847600 3850160 Three survivors. One male, two female.
3850240 3853437 I repeat, one male, two female.

3915600 3920276 We've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
3920360 3922669 You can all have a shower.
3922760 3925957 You look like you need one. Please.

3945080 3950074 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris.
3958520 3961557 She's lost her dad. That's how she is.

3973360 3976796 Don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

3980480 3985270 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

3985360 3989114 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
3990360 3992669 I want her to be OK.
3994200 3996270 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
3996360 3999033 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4037520 4040876 - We did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4040960 4046830 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4049160 4053153 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4057480 4061792 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4062160 4064958 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4065040 4068032 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4068120 4071078 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4080720 4086352 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4089920 4093993 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4094080 4098551 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4101680 4106390 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4106480 4108789 The belly of the house. The heart.

4108880 4113908 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4116080 4118116 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4118200 4121272 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Give us some.

4121360 4125239 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4127680 4130558 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4153960 4158829 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4166200 4170079 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4191840 4195116 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4206280 4211434 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4249560 4251915 You'll have to wait and see
4254240 4256708 We hope it's chips, it's chips
4272440 4275671 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4282960 4285315 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4285400 4288472 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4288560 4291552 but this omelette will do just as well.

4306480 4310234 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4310320 4313596 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4320280 4322953 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4323760 4328993 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4329080 4333437 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4333520 4336637 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.

4339520 4343399 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4343480 4347632 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4347720 4350712 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4352720 4356679 Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4357400 4359755 So if the infection wipes us all out,

4366760 4369638 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah.
4369720 4372837 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4375600 4380594 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4383280 4387239 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4389920 4394277 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4394360 4399593 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4399680 4403150 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4411120 4413953 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4416800 4419917 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4420800 4423792 He's one of the people you're talking about.

4479360 4482830 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt.
4498840 4501035 I ain't never seen that in my life.

4522760 4528153 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4528240 4530356 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4532080 4537154 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4538720 4540790 - That's an offer.
- Give her some.

4546760 4551072 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4558480 4561392 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4561480 4564790 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4574840 4577434 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4580200 4582668 The rest of you, go with him.

4604160 4608199 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4608280 4609759 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4609840 4614789 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.

4635920 4640516 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4660640 4664269 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4665400 4669916 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4670000 4672753 What could I say to him?

4672840 4677834 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4678720 4682395 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4682480 4688350 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4705200 4707111 - What is it?
- We have to go.
4714880 4716757 We get in the car and we go.

4718080 4722437 No! You're not going to keep them here.
You've got to let them go.

4722520 4725637 You can't keep them here.
Stay where you are.
4725720 4728314 I'm not gonna let you keep them here.
4741680 4743910 I want to give you a chance.
4747600 4749795 But I can't let them go.

4776720 4779359 Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4779440 4782238 Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4782320 4785118 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4785200 4788670 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4788760 4792992 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons.

4793080 4796231 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

4796320 4801792 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane.

4802800 4806679 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
4808000 4810992 Just imagine, just think about it.
4812000 4814195 How could Infection cross the oceans?

4814280 4818398 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

4818480 4821074 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

4821160 4824994 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

4829120 4832556 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

4840960 4845158 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane.

4889800 4892792 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

4893840 4898755 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

4898840 4902594 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
4906280 4908271 Get up, you cunt. Fucking move.

4932240 4935516 Come on then, you fucking pansies.
Do me first.
4935600 4937989 No, Mitch. Just use the gat.

4938080 4940992 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em.

4943720 4946632 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

4946720 4948551 - I'll shoot them.
- No, you won't.

4948640 4951950 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

4960880 4964668 You stupid cunt. What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

4964760 4968753 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you.
- Where's he fucking gone?
4969960 4972679 Fuck it. Get up. Get after him.

4975080 4978152 - Jones, move it.
- I can see him. I can see him.

4987520 4990318 - Can you see him?
- Through there.
5004200 5007510 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5044960 5048748 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5048840 5052276 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5052360 5054794 which she certainly has no use for.
5055760 5057512 You can't do it to Hannah.

5057600 5061149 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.
5074120 5076793 Come on. It's only dressing up.

5076880 5080111 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5098080 5102039 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5103840 5107389 - Listen. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5107480 5111473 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5134280 5137033 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5159160 5162948 We're gonna eat these, Hannah.
Come on. Eat these.
5163040 5165110 Are you trying to kill me?
5181360 5183920 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5189520 5191988 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5412640 5414995 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5416000 5419788 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5422440 5424954 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5437600 5439989 I think they're having an effect.

5454920 5457673 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5458400 5461358 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5461440 5463351 Is that the way it works?

5466760 5470673 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5488840 5491832 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5491920 5494639 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5516920 5521630 Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5528760 5531991 Don'tjust stand there,
you soppy cunt. Get after them.
5553520 5556353 What the fuck you gonna do now?
5581840 5585435 Defend these stairs with your fucking life.

5756840 5761038 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets.

5821840 5826436 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

5826520 5830798 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
5830880 5833110 And we'll live happy ever after.
5894840 5897229 That was longer than a heartbeat.
5919840 5922229 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

5922320 5925517 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
5933680 5937116 Hannah, it's OK. He's not infected.
5937200 5939191 I thought he was biting you.

5939280 5943592 - I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
- It's a long story.
5943680 5946114 We have to get out of here. Come on.
6040400 6042709 Come on, Jim, breathe. Fucking breathe.
6132600 6135160 You looked all right in this, you know.

6155920 6159117 - I can't hear anything.
- I told you, I heard it.
6212320 6215118 Do you think he saw us this time?
